  • Field Details

    • fMyThreadPool

      public final ThreadPoolExecutor fMyThreadPool

  • Constructor Details

    • ExtasysUDPServer

      public ExtasysUDPServer(String name, String description, int corePoolSize, int maximumPoolSize)
      Constructs a new Extasys UDP Server.
      Parameters:
      name - is the name of the server.
      description - is the description of the server.
      corePoolSize - is the number of threads to keep in the pool, even if they are idle.
      maximumPoolSize - is the maximum number of threads to allow in the pool.

  • Method Details

    • AddListener

      public UDPListener AddListener(String name, InetAddress ipAddress, int port, int readBufferSize, int readDataTimeOut)
      Add a new listener to this server.
      Parameters:
      name - is the listener's name.
      ipAddress - is the listener's IP address.
      port - is the listener's udp port.
      readBufferSize - is the maximum size of bytes the listener can use to read incoming bytes at a time.
      readDataTimeOut - is the maximum time in milliseconds a client can use to send data to the listener.
      Returns:
      the listener.

    • RemoveListener

      public void RemoveListener(String name)
      Stops and removes a UDP listener from this server.
      Parameters:
      name - is the name of the UDP listener.

    • SendData

      public void SendData(DatagramPacket packet)
      Send data. This method sends the data from all listeners.
      Parameters:
      packet - is the DatagramPacket to send.

    • Start

      public void Start() throws SocketException
      Start or restart the server.
      Throws:
      SocketException

    • Stop

      public void Stop()
      Stop the server.

    • Dispose

      public void Dispose()
      Dispose the server. This method stops the server and disposes all the active members of this class. After calling this method you cannot re-start the server.

    • OnDataReceive

      public void OnDataReceive(UDPListener listener, DatagramPacket packet)

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns the name of this UDP server.
      Returns:
      the name of this UDP server.

      public void setName(String name)
      Sets the name of this UDP server
      Parameters:
      name - the name to set on this UDP server

      public String getDescription()
      Returns the description of this UDP server.

      public void setDescription(String description)
      Sets the description of this UDP server
      Parameters:
      description - the description to set on this UDP server

    • getListeners

      public ArrayList<UDPListener> getListeners()
      Returns an ArrayList with this server's UDP listeners. The ArrayList elements are UDPListener classes.
      Returns:
      ArrayList with this server's UDP listeners.

    • getBytesIn

      public long getBytesIn()
      Returns the total bytes received from this server.
      Returns:
      the total bytes received from this server.
